Definition.WordDefinition: Agenda, KS (city, FIPS 475) Location: 39.70724 N, 97.43186 W Population (1990): 81 (53 housing units) Area: 0.4 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 66930

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Agendum \A*gen"dum\ ([.a]*j[e^]n"d[u^]m), n.; pl. {Agenda} ([.a]*j[e^]n"d[.a]). [L., neut. of the gerundive of agere to act.] 1. Something to be done; in the pl., a memorandum book; also, a list of items to be considered. See {agenda}. [1913 Webster]
2. A church service; a ritual or liturgy. [In this sense, usually Agenda.] [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
agenda \agenda\ ([.a]*j[e^]n"d[.a]), n. a temporally organized plan for matters to be attended to.
Syn: docket, schedule [WordNet 1.5 +PJC]
2. A list of matters to be discussed (as at a meeting).
Syn: agendum, docket, order of business [WordNet 1.5]
3. A motive or set of goals; as, to have one's own agenda; especially, a secret motive; also called {hidden agenda}; as, some of the news commentators themselves have an agenda.
Syn: goal, hidden motive, secret motive, hidden agenda. [PJC] ||
agenda n 1: a temporally organized plan for matters to be attended to [syn: {docket}, {schedule}] 2: a list of matters to be taken up (as at a meeting) [syn: {agendum}, {order of business}]
